query: A weak hashing algorithm and small sizes of seeds/secrets in Googles gVisor allowed for a remote attacker to calculate a local IP address and a per-boot identifier that could aid in tracking of a device in certain circumstances.

keyphrases.base_query: A weak hashing algorithm and small sizes of seeds/secrets in Googles gVisor allowed for a remote attacker to calculate a local IP address and a per-boot identifier that could aid in tracking of a device in certain circumstances.
